cortex_2_concepts.vision: Transform AI memory from static storage to dynamic cognitive operating system
cortex_2_concepts.core_innovation: Hot-swappable cognitive modules with self-loading intelligence

cognitive_modules.definition: Self-contained units of knowledge, capability, or behavior

self_loading.definition: Autonomous detection and loading of required modules
self_loading.learning: Improves loading decisions based on usage patterns

resource_management.goal: Maximize capability within context window constraints

key_differences_from_cortex_v1.static_vs_dynamic: V1 had fixed layers, V2 has dynamic modules
key_differences_from_cortex_v1.manual_vs_automatic: V1 required manual operations, V2 self-manages
key_differences_from_cortex_v1.storage_vs_os: V1 was storage system, V2 is cognitive operating system
